verses.verse: And Dinah <WH1783> the daughter <WH1323> of Leah <WH3812>, which she bare <WH3205> <WH8804> unto Ya`akov <WH3290>, went out <WH3318> <WH8799> to see <WH7200> <WH8800> the daughters <WH1323> of the land <WH776>.

And when SH'khem <WH7927> the son <WH1121> of Hamor <WH2544> the Hivite <WH2340>, prince <WH5387> of the country <WH776>, saw <WH7200> <WH8799> her, he took <WH3947> <WH8799> her, and lay <WH7901> <WH8799> with her, and defiled her <WH6031> <WH8762>.

And his soul <WH5315> clave <WH1692> <WH8799> unto Dinah <WH1783> the daughter <WH1323> of Ya`akov <WH3290>, and he loved <WH157> <WH8799> the damsel <WH5291>, and spake <WH1696> <WH8762> kindly <WH3820> unto the damsel <WH5291>.
And SH'khem <WH7927> spake <WH559> <WH8799> unto his father <WH1> Hamor <WH2544>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Get <WH3947> <WH8798> me this damsel <WH3207> to wife <WH802>.

And Ya`akov <WH3290> heard <WH8085> <WH8804> that he had defiled <WH2930> <WH8765> Dinah <WH1783> his daughter <WH1323>: now his sons <WH1121> were with his cattle <WH4735> in the field <WH7704>: and Ya`akov <WH3290> held his peace <WH2790> <WH8689> until they were come <WH935> <WH8800>.
And Hamor <WH2544> the father <WH1> of SH'khem <WH7927> went out <WH3318> <WH8799> unto Ya`akov <WH3290> to commune <WH1696> <WH8763> with <WH854> him.

And the sons <WH1121> of Ya`akov <WH3290> came <WH935> <WH8804> out of the field <WH7704> when they heard <WH8085> <WH8800> it: and the men <WH582> were grieved <WH6087> <WH8691>, and they were very <WH3966> wroth <WH2734> <WH8799>, because he had wrought <WH6213> <WH8804> folly <WH5039> in Yisra'EL <WH3478> in lying <WH7901> <WH8800> with Ya`akov's <WH3290> daughter <WH1323>; which thing ought not to be done <WH6213> <WH8735>.

And Hamor <WH2544> communed <WH1696> <WH8762> with them, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, The soul <WH5315> of my son <WH1121> SH'khem <WH7927> longeth <WH2836> <WH8804> for your daughter <WH1323>: I pray you give <WH5414> <WH8798> her him to wife <WH802>.
And make ye marriages <WH2859> <WH8690> with us, and give <WH5414> <WH8799> your daughters <WH1323> unto us, and take <WH3947> <WH8799> our daughters <WH1323> unto you.

And ye shall dwell <WH3427> <WH8799> with us: and the land <WH776> shall be <WH1961> <WH8799> before you <WH6440>; dwell <WH3427> <WH8798> and trade <WH5503> <WH8804> ye therein, and get you possessions <WH270> <WH8734> therein.

And SH'khem <WH7927> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto her father <WH1> and unto her brethren <WH251>, Let me find <WH4672> <WH8799> grace <WH2580> in your eyes <WH5869>, and what ye shall say <WH559> <WH8799> unto me I will give <WH5414> <WH8799>.

Ask <WH7235> <WH8685> me never so much <WH3966> dowry <WH4119> and gift <WH4976>, and I will give <WH5414> <WH8799> according as ye shall say <WH559> <WH8799> unto me: but give <WH5414> <WH8798> me the damsel <WH5291> to wife <WH802>.

And the sons <WH1121> of Ya`akov <WH3290> answered <WH6030> <WH8799> SH'khem <WH7927> and Hamor <WH2544> his father <WH1> deceitfully <WH4820>, and said <WH1696> <WH8762>, because he had defiled <WH2930> <WH8765> Dinah <WH1783> their sister <WH269>:

And they said <WH559> <WH8799> unto them, We cannot <WH3808> <WH3201> <WH8799> do <WH6213> <WH8800> this thing <WH1697>, to give <WH5414> <WH8800> our sister <WH269> to one <WH376> that is uncircumcised <WH6190>; for that were a reproach <WH2781> unto us:
But in this <WH2063> will we consent <WH225> <WH8735> unto you: If ye will be as we be, that every male <WH2145> of you be circumcised <WH4135> <WH8736>;

Then will we give <WH5414> <WH8804> our daughters <WH1323> unto you, and we will take <WH3947> <WH8799> your daughters <WH1323> to us, and we will dwell <WH3427> <WH8804> with you, and we will become one <WH259> people <WH5971>.
But if ye will not hearken <WH8085> <WH8799> unto us, to be circumcised <WH4135> <WH8736>; then will we take <WH3947> <WH8804> our daughter <WH1323>, and we will be gone <WH1980> <WH8804>.
And their words <WH1697> pleased <WH3190> <WH8799> <WH5869> Hamor <WH2544>, and SH'khem <WH7927> Hamor's <WH2544> son <WH1121>.

And the young man <WH5288> deferred <WH309> <WH8765> not to do <WH6213> <WH8800> the thing <WH1697>, because he had delight <WH2654> <WH8804> in Ya`akov's <WH3290> daughter <WH1323>: and he was more honourable <WH3513> <WH8737> than all the house <WH1004> of his father <WH1>.

And Hamor <WH2544> and SH'khem <WH7927> his son <WH1121> came <WH935> <WH8799> unto the gate <WH8179> of their city <WH5892>, and communed <WH1696> <WH8762> with the men <WH582> of their city <WH5892>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

These men <WH582> are peaceable <WH8003> with <WH854> us; therefore let them dwell <WH3427> <WH8799> in the land <WH776>, and trade <WH5503> <WH8799> therein; for the land <WH776>, behold, it is large <WH7342> enough <WH3027> for them <WH6440>; let us take <WH3947> <WH8799> their daughters <WH1323> to us for wives <WH802>, and let us give <WH5414> <WH8799> them our daughters <WH1323>.

Only herein <WH2063> will the men <WH582> consent <WH225> <WH8735> unto us for to dwell <WH3427> <WH8800> with us, to be one <WH259> people <WH5971>, if every male <WH2145> among us be circumcised <WH4135> <WH8736>, as they are circumcised <WH4135> <WH8737>.
Shall not their cattle <WH4735> and their substance <WH7075> and every beast <WH929> of theirs be ours? only let us consent <WH225> <WH8735> unto them, and they will dwell <WH3427> <WH8799> with us.

And unto Hamor <WH2544> and unto SH'khem <WH7927> his son <WH1121> hearkened <WH8085> <WH8799> all that went out <WH3318> <WH8802> of the gate <WH8179> of his city <WH5892>; and every male <WH2145> was circumcised <WH4135> <WH8735>, all that went out <WH3318> <WH8802> of the gate <WH8179> of his city <WH5892>.

And it came to pass on the third <WH7992> day <WH3117>, when they were sore <WH3510> <WH8802>, that two <WH8147> of the sons <WH1121> of Ya`akov <WH3290>, SHim`on <WH8095> and Levi <WH3878>, Dinah's <WH1783> brethren <WH251>, took <WH3947> <WH8799> each man <WH376> his sword <WH2719>, and came <WH935> <WH8799> upon the city <WH5892> boldly <WH983>, and slew <WH2026> <WH8799> all the males <WH2145>.

And they slew <WH2026> <WH8804> Hamor <WH2544> and SH'khem <WH7927> his son <WH1121> with the edge <WH6310> of the sword <WH2719>, and took <WH3947> Dinah <WH1783> out <WH3947> <WH8799> of SH'khem's <WH7927> house <WH1004>, and went out <WH3318> <WH8799>.
The sons <WH1121> of Ya`akov <WH3290> came <WH935> <WH8804> upon the slain <WH2491>, and spoiled <WH962> <WH8799> the city <WH5892>, because they had defiled <WH2930> <WH8765> their sister <WH269>.
They took <WH3947> <WH8804> their sheep <WH6629>, and their oxen <WH1241>, and their asses <WH2543>, and that which was in the city <WH5892>, and that which was in the field <WH7704>,
And all their wealth <WH2428>, and all their little ones <WH2945>, and their wives <WH802> took they captive <WH7617> <WH8804>, and spoiled <WH962> <WH8799> even all that was in the house <WH1004>.

And Ya`akov <WH3290> said <WH559> <WH8799> to SHim`on <WH8095> and Levi <WH3878>, Ye have troubled <WH5916> <WH8804> me to make me to stink <WH887> <WH8687> among the inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802> of the land <WH776>, among the Kanahanites <WH3669> and the Perizzites <WH6522>: and I being few <WH4962> in number <WH4557>, they shall gather themselves together <WH622> <WH8738> against me, and slay me <WH5221> <WH8689>; and I shall be destroyed <WH8045> <WH8738>, I and my house <WH1004>.
And they said <WH559> <WH8799>, Should he deal <WH6213> <WH8799> with our sister <WH269> as with an harlot <WH2181> <WH8802> ?
